programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez

programme.sub-title: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam

programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha!

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?

programme.sub-title: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.sub-title: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode

programme.sub-title: A Fora Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido

programme.title: Frente a Frente, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Tudo por Justia, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.title: B13-U 13 Distrito - Ultimato, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Sem Perdo, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Caada Sangrenta, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Steven Down o nico sobrevivente do exrcito dos EUA na Nicargua por volta de 1986 e foi torturado por um grupo paramilitar mascarado. Ele um homem paranico, problemtico e confuso. Um veterano em busca da verdade.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Inimigo Invisvel
programme.desc: A equipe yamato segue para dar reforo equipe kakashi. Bem antes de sua partida naruto recebe uma dica para aperfeioar seu novo jutsu entrando na barriga de gamatatsu

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Labirinto Dos Reflexos Distorcidos
programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Alvo Revelado
programme.desc: Quebrando o campo de fora com seu recente jutsu com os sapos, naruto e a unidade de apoio chega ao local da batalha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Besta De Cauda Barulhenta
programme.desc: Os ninjas da folha usam os morcegos para procurar guren. Akamaru e kiba descobrem um alto nvel de chakra em seu destino

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Dentro Do Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Dentro de uma nvoa pesada, os ninjas da folha tentam achar o naruto. A equipe aumenta a guarda quando fica sabendo que a nvoa que cerca o lago causa iluses.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sentimento De Cada Um
programme.desc: Naruto entra na nvoa para procurar yukimaru. Guren fica alerta para proteger yukimaru, cuja situao atual o impede de se mexer.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Os novos Sete Espadachins da Nvoa comeam uma revolta. O objetivo deles transformar a aldeia na Aldeia da Nvoa Sangrenta novamente!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Inojin gosta de desenhar desde pequeno. A especialidade dele o Pergaminho das Superbestas. Um dia, do nada, ele perde a habilidade de usar esse jutsu!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto o primeiro a enfrentar Kakashi na prova. Apesar de se esforar bastante, ele imobilizado e fica irritado com as duras crticas de Kakashi turma.

programme.desc: Algum solta os animais das jaulas do zoolgico, e Sumire, Wasabi e Namida recebem a misso de resgat-los.

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin'emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido's army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido's army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!

programme.title: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!

programme.title: To Law and the others' surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido's formidable subordinates are also called in.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaidos Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Samurai Warriors Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!

programme.title: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido's banquet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaidos Banquet!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thinking of Otama! Luffys Furious Strike!

programme.title: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!

programme.title: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido's castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom's children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!

programme.title: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaidos Son!

programme.title: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido's son Yamato's motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy's punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamatos Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamatos Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffys All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ill Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Odens Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Wont Forgive Him! Choppers Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Hackers, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A neophyte hacker becomes the target of the FBI after he unknowingly taps into a high-tech embezzling scheme which could cause a horrific environmental disaster in this suspenseful drama.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Strawberry Roan, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Genes first color film stars Champion in the title role as a wild outlaw stallion, branded a killer, and the two-fisted cowboy who fights off a gun-crazed posse to win justice for the noble animal.

programme.title: Riders In The Sky, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry helps a gal clear her father's name who is accused of murdering a gambler. When the leader of the gamblers gets involved, it's up to Gene and his comic pal Pat Buttram to outwit the badmen.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: First Sunday, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals discover they haven't got a prayer when they attempt to steal from the local church.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Baby Boy, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: Jody is a 20-year-old African American in South Central L.A. who is trying to live large but doesn't have a job. Growing up is tough on Jody, but a series of events force him to learn lessons about living, loving and surviving as a man in the hood.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A freak accident caused by Mimete results in Hotaru's house getting pulled into a dimensional rift, with Hotaru and Chibi-Usa trapped inside.
programme.sub-title: Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians' Gamble

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.
programme.sub-title: The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends sneak into Mugen Academy in search of Hotaru, who has gone missing.
programme.sub-title: An Invasion from Another Dimension: Mystery of Mugen Academy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new variety of flower called Tellun is being sold at a flower shop in the Juban District.
programme.sub-title: A Bewitching Flower That Steals Hearts: Tellu, the Third Witch

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the Mugen Academy. They meet Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami's intelligence.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Cyprine manages to steal pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa's power and kidnaps her!
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.
programme.sub-title: The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotarus and Mistress 9s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotarus heart.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Shooting Star: Saturn and the Messiah

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.
programme.sub-title: A New Life: Parting of the Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.
programme.sub-title: A Guardian's Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.
programme.sub-title: Meeting of Destiny: The Night Pegasus Dances

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.
programme.sub-title: Super Transformation Once Again: Pegasus's Power

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.
programme.sub-title: Protect Mom's Dream: Double Moon's New Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tigers Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawks Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamorus friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.
programme.sub-title: The Perfect Couple: Usagi and Mamoru's Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.
programme.sub-title: Artemis is Cheating? Enter the Mysterious Kitten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.
programme.sub-title: Makoto's Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
programme.sub-title: Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy's Invitation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
programme.sub-title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
programme.sub-title: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usuis new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fishs Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
programme.sub-title: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguardespecially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
programme.sub-title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.
programme.sub-title: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors

programme.title: Solomon Kane, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A man (James Purefoy) must renounce his newly taken vows of peace to rescue a young woman (Rachel Hurd-Wood) from an evil sorcerer (Jason Flemyng).

programme.title: Gods of Egypt, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A defiant mortal (Brenton Thwaites) forms an unlikely alliance with the powerful god Horus (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) to save the world from Set (Gerard Butler), the merciless god of darkness.

programme.title: Outlander, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An alien soldier (James Caviezel) crashes on Earth during the time of the Vikings and blends his technology with theirs to hunt his enemy.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: The Cimmerian warrior slashes his way across Hyboria on a mission that begins as a personal vendetta but turns into an epic battle against a supernatural evil.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Solomon Kane, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A man (James Purefoy) must renounce his newly taken vows of peace to rescue a young woman (Rachel Hurd-Wood) from an evil sorcerer (Jason Flemyng).

programme.title: Knowing, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A professor (Nicolas Cage) and his son obtain an encoded time-capsule document that lists every major disaster over the past 50 years and predicts a future global calamity.

programme.title: The Giver, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A teen (Brenton Thwaites) discovers the dark truth about his community's secret past from an old man (Jeff Bridges) who is the sole keeper of their world's memories.

programme.title: Push, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A 13-year-old clairvoyant (Dakota Fanning) and the son (Chris Evans) of a murdered assassin join forces against a covert government agency that dabbles in psychic drugs and warfare.

programme.title: Chaos, (2005, Action)

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um policial disfarado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiana entrar em campo, mas tem dvidas se ela tem o que preciso para completar a misso. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Linha de Ao, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999)
programme.desc: 1999. Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Gtz Otto, Vincent Hammond, Charles Robinson, Brent Jefferson Lowe, Roger Sloman, Layla Roberts, Patr... Diretor: Graham Baker

programme.title: Guerra Biolgica, (1998)
programme.desc: 1998. Um imunologista da CIA se aposenta e vai morar com sua filha numa cidadezinha distante. Quando um miliciano detona uma bomba biolgica na regio, cabe ao ex-agente evitar o pior e salvar as vidas de todos. Gneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Steven Seagal, Gailard Sartain, L.Q. Jones, Silas Weir Mitchell, Camilla Belle, Dan Beene, Damon Collazo, Whitney Yellow Robe, Brad Leland, Molly McClure Diretor: Dean Semler

programme.title: Caada ao Presidente, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Aps o avio em que estava ter sido abatido por terroristas, o presidente dos Estados Unidos est ferido e perdido no meio de uma zona rural finlandesa. E sua vida agora est nas mos de Oskari um tmido jovem de treze anos de idade. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Samuel L. Jackson, Onni Tommila, Ray Stevenson Diretor: Jalmari Helander

programme.title: Evidncias de um Crime, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. Aps a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profisso para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaando a vida estvel que construiu para a famlia. Gneros: Thriller Elenco: Samuel L. Jackson, Eva Mendes, Ed Harris, Robert Foster Diretor: Renny Harlin

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad, Liotta, Pitt, Ray Diretor: Andrew Dominik

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castaeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Robert De Niro, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Kate Bosworth, Dave Bautista, Stephen Cyrus Sepher, Gina Carano, Morris Chestnut, Lydia Hull, Mark-Paul Gosselaar, D.B. Sweeney Diretor: Scott Mann

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen, David Riley Diretor: Elliott Lester, Jordan Hill

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Danielsno demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Ninja, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Scott Adkins Tsuyoshi Ihara, Miki Hijii Diretor: Isaac Florentine

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Esprito de Vingana, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Nove anos aps se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldio e deix-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitria, at ser obrigado a entrar em ao novamente. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cage, Elba, Idris, Nicolas Diretor: Mark Neveldine

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. programme.title: A Vinganca Minha, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Aps o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho atravs da fronteira para Vancouver. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Perseguindo o Assassino, (1970)

programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird. Starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Lola Petticrew, Leah Harvey.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: A devoted mother vanishes after heading to pick up her children. her car is found abandoned.

programme.title: This Time Next Year
programme.desc: Minnie and Quinn are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldnt be more different. Years later they find themselves together again. Maybe its time to take a chance on love. Starring Golda Rosheuvel, John Hannah, Sophie Cookson.

programme.title: Happy Clothes: A Film About Patricia Field
programme.desc: Showcases the life, work and legacy of Patricia Field, an Emmy Award-winning costume designer behind "Sex and the City," "Emily in Paris" and "The Devil Wears Prada."

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: DJ Brodie is finally ready to spin a steady mashup with a fun-loving lady.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: A perfect bank heist is pulled off by an underworld gang in Boston, Massachusetts; but when one criminal gets caught for an unrelated crime in another town, he starts sending threatening letters from jail asking for his cut.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A home invader ties Samantha up while kidnapping and murdering her husband; as Samantha explains what happened to her, it turns out that there may be more to this crime than there seems.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Professional soldier Skylar Nemetz claims he has a momentary lapse in gun safety that lead to his wife Danielles tragic death; authorities arent buying that someone with his level of training could accidentally forget to do some basic gun care.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Police finds a new mother murdered soon after reported missing; they bring her partner and his best friend in to be interrogated about her final night; not every interrogation method works with every suspect, and not every theory proves true.

programme.title: The Wandering Barber
programme.desc: Jeremy Regan believes places like his barber shop are public spaces of hallowed ground, to potentially understand the world better; to prove his theory, Jeremy hits the road, making his way to Ukraine in the midst of war to learn about local barbers.

programme.title: Tootoo
programme.desc: Jordin Tootoos life has been predicated on his determination to rise above every challenge he has faced including the extraordinary pressure of being the first Inuk player in the NHL, addiction and tragic personal loss.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Sydney Loofes vibrant life takes a tragic turn in November 2017 when she enters the world of online dating and unknowingly crosses paths with Bailey Boswell and Aubrey Trail; as their second date approaches, the couple hatches a sinister plan.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night; but when the weather report comes in for the evening showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A surprise cruise vacation for a husband and wife from Olympia, Washington ends up with one of them going overboard; is it revenge, jealousy or a murderous impulse at sea?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A professors assistant goes missing at sea near the end of a long voyage; clues to her disappearance are detailed in a diary discovered in her cabin; how did she disappear; does anyone on board know what happened to her?

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Picky planner Courtney likes hot yoga and hotter men; her tractor-driving mother wont settle for less than farm fresh perfection.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: The Matchmaker has her hands full finding a funny, winning date for Jessica to fall in love with.

programme.title: Gaslit by My Husband: The Morgan Metzer Story
programme.desc: After a masked intruder assaults Morgan Metzer in her home, her ex-husband, Rodney, shows up minutes later. Questioned by the authorities, Rodneys story doesnt seem to add up, making him the prime suspect in the attack. Starring Jana Kramer, Austin Nichols, J. Barrett Cooper.

programme.title: The Hands That Feed Us
programme.desc: Exploring the challenges of making a living as a modern Canadian farmer; how they sell their food and how little control they have over the process and price; from small scale to massive debt; from farmers markets to supply chain.
